articles.description: This year’s annual meteor shower spectacle has already begun but it will be peaking this week on Wednesday in India between the night of 22-23 April.
articles.content:
The Lyrids are an annual meteor shower that was first witnessed over 2,700 years ago, making them the oldest recorded meteor showers. Since then, the meteor showers have been observed around the second half of April every year.
